Changelog: Added Webmentions

My website now has web mentions ðŸŽ‰

For those who don't know what web mentions are; its a way to show social media comments and interactions on your website. If I post a blog post to twitter and someone comments or likes that tweet, that will be added to the blog post.

Example

Working an inside IR35 contract

Sources

Thanks to Sia Karamalegos, AngÃ©lique Weger and Max BÃ¶ck for their blog posts and their code, because without it I wouldn't have managed to add this to my website.

  • https://mxb.dev/blog/using-webmentions-on-static-sites/
  • https://github.com/angeliquejw/dev-blog

Posted on 27th May 2021, by Juan Fernandes in notes changelog
